thread.title: Jury clears widow of Pulse nightclub gunman

title: Jury clears widow of Pulse nightclub gunman
text:
Jury clears widow of Pulse nightclub gunman 1:02pm EDT - 01:14 
An Orlando jury on Friday cleared the widow of the Pulse nightclub gunman of all charges in the massacre that killed 49 people, finding her not guilty of misleading investigators and aiding her husband in the attack. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
